T22.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Trout & Salmon Meal Recipe for Kittens
T22.description: Grain-free food with quality fish, specially formulated for growing kittens
T22.benefit1: Quality fish protein for strong muscles
T22.forWhom: Perfect for kittens up to 1 year old

T23.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Chicken & Turkey for Small-Medium Dogs
T23.description: Grain-free food with chicken and turkey, suitable for all life stages
T23.benefit3: Includes vegetables and fruits for overall health
T23.forWhom: For small and medium dogs of all ages

T24.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Salmon & Trout for Adult Cats
T24.description: Grain-free food with quality fish for adult cats
T24.benefit1: Rich in Omega-3 & 6 for healthy skin and coat
T24.forWhom: Perfect for adult cats with sensitive skin

T25.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Lamb & Lentils
T25.description: Grain-free food with lamb and lentils for adult dogs
T25.benefit1: Single lamb protein - excellent for sensitivities
T25.benefit2: Lentils and legumes for sustained energy
T25.forWhom: For small-medium adult dogs with sensitive skin

T26.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Lamb, Legumes & Turkey
T26.description: Grain-free food with lamb and turkey for adult dogs
T26.forWhom: Perfect for active dogs needing mobility support

T27.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Turkey, Chicken & Duck for Small Dogs
T27.description: Grain-free multi-poultry food for small and toy dogs

T27.forWhom: For small and toy dogs of all ages

T28.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Salmon, Trout & Herring for Puppies
T28.description: Grain-free fish food for small breed puppies

T28.benefit2: Quality fish for soft skin and coat
T28.forWhom: Perfect for small breed puppies up to 1 year

T29.name: Nutram Total Grain-Free Salmon, Trout & Herring for Small Adult Dogs

T29.forWhom: For small and toy adult dogs with sensitive skin or mobility needs
